>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/impersonation/start"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Start an impersonation session to act as another user for support, administrative, or testing purposes. Requires appropriate permissions and logs all impersonation activity for audit purposes.
